author: donaldp
msg: Made it possible to reference a global directory ${cjan.lib} that contains implementations of all dependent jars.
Also made it possible to install into a global ${phoenix.home}
If a user wants to take advantage of this they should ideally set them in a .ant.properties in their home directory. They then run build.[sh|bat] install rather than standard command.

msg: Acts like a conneciton handler but instead is associated with Datagram packets/sockets.
